title: [K-12] Development of Learning Design Strategies through Participatory Workshops

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with foundational language teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Targets pre-service/in-service teachers with diverse cultural backgrounds, emphasizing participatory activities centered on learner experiences

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three language learning design strategies suitable for diverse cultural contexts
Learners can design specific language education modules considering learner experiences through participatory workshop activities
Learners can revise designed educational modules based on peer feedback and submit them as final deliverables
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
